correctness.rationale: Several core fields are incorrect or violate the schema/requirements. Key issues: (1) Growth-per-cycle is wrong by unit and magnitude: article states ~0.21 nm/cycle, but extraction uses 0.21 Å/cycle (should be ~2.1 Å). (2) Substrate is hallucinated (“thermally grown SiO2/Si substrates”)—the article does not specify this; IGZO is deposited on the etched MIM sidewall. (3) Reactant mapping is incomplete/misaligned: O2 plasma co-reactant is given only for “IGZO” instead of per sub-cycle compounds (InOx, GaOx, ZnO). (4) Numerous required values are null or placeholders (“Not Found”) contrary to the no-empty/null rule and schema intent: carrierGas, purgingGas, reactor.manufacturer, deliveryMethod, pressure.numericValue, thicknessControl.numberofCycles, thicknessControl.filmThickness, processParameters.filmThickness, nucleationPeriod, dosingTime/purgeTime/flowRates (empty arrays), materialProperties fields (uniformity.variation, conformality.aspectRatio, elementalConcentration.values, crystallinity, roughness, filmDensity), deviceProperties (fieldEffectMobility, onOffRatio, deviceStructure), and otherAspects (safety, filmStability, reproducibility). (5) Saturation = true is ungrounded in the text. (6) FilmComposition.atomicRatio = 1:1:1 is not supported by a characterization method in the article; the 1:1:1 value refers to cycle ratio, not a measured composition. Correct items include PEALD method, TFS200 tool, precursors (DADI/TMGa/DEZ), temperature (250 °C), plasma power (38 W), and device Vth (~−3.5 V) and SS (~230 mV/dec). To improve, fix GPC with correct units/value, remove “Not Found”/nulls or populate with traceable values, provide co-reactant per sub-cycle, correct/omit ungrounded substrate, and avoid reporting composition ratios without measurement evidence.

completeness.rationale: Multiple required elements are missing, null, or not traceable to the article, and there are unit/semantic errors. Key issues: (1) processParameters: pressure.quantityValue.numericValue = null; thicknessControl.numberofCycles.numericValue = null; thicknessControl.filmThickness provided with null; top-level filmThickness also null; nucleationPeriod null; dosingTime/purgeTime/flowRates are required arrays but left empty—violates the ‘no empty/null’ requirement and undermines completeness. (2) reactantSelection: carrierGas and purgingGas set to “Not Found”; coReactant is listed once for ‘IGZO’ rather than per sub-cycle compound (InOx, GaOx, ZnO) even though the article states O2 plasma for all; substrate “thermally grown SiO2/Si substrates” is not stated in the article (not traceable). (3) thicknessControl.growthPerCycle uses 0.21 with ANGSTROM unit, but the article reports ~0.21 nm/cycle (i.e., 2.1 Å/cycle). This is a 10× unit error. (4) materialProperties: most required subfields are present but populated with null or placeholders (uniformity.variation, conformality.aspectRatio, crystallinity, roughness, filmDensity, elementalConcentration), while the included atomicRatio of 1:1:1 reflects the deposition cycle ratio rather than a measured composition and lacks characterization method—misaligned with article data. (5) deviceProperties: onOffRatio, mobility, fieldEffectMobility are null despite article reporting Ion and Ioff (enabling at least an estimated on/off); thresholdVoltage and SS are correctly extracted. (6) otherAspects: safety = “Not Found”, filmStability = null, reproducibility = null—placeholders/nulls not allowed. To improve: correct GPC to 2.1 Å/cycle; remove unsubstantiated substrate or replace with article-backed wording; specify O2 plasma as co-reactant for InOx, GaOx, and ZnO; provide non-empty values or explicitly supported omissions for dosing/purge/flow/pressure (or mark as not reported only if schema allows); either supply measured composition data or adjust filmComposition per article; populate or omit optional fields without placeholders; compute/report on/off ratio from Ion/Ioff if consistent with article. Overall, multiple schema and traceability gaps remain, so completeness is low.
